item.title: Wolfram - What is ChatGPT doing...and why does it work?
item.description: okay hello everyone well usually in this time slot each week i do a science and technology q a for kids and others which i’ve been doing for about three years now where i try and answer arbitrary questions about science and technology today i thought i would do something slightly different i just wrote a piece about chat gpt uh what’s it actually doing why does it work i thought i would
